verses.verse: That <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%>, that <S%G3739>which<s%> we have <S%G191>heard<s%>, that <S%G3739>which<s%> we have seen <S%G3708>with<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%>, that <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G2300>beheld<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G5584>handled<s%>, <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G3056>Word<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%>

(and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G2222>life<s%> was <S%G5319>manifested<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> we have <S%G3708>seen<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> bear <S%G3140>witness<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G518>declare<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> the <S%G2222>life<s%>, the <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G5319>manifested<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%>);

that <S%G3739>which<s%> we have <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> declare <S%G518>we<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> may <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>: <S%G2532>yea<s%>, and <S%G2251>our<s%> <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> is <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G31>message<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we have <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G312>announce<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5457>light<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4653>darkness<s%> at <S%G3762>all<s%>.

If <S%G1437><s%> we <S%G2036>say<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4655>darkness<s%>, we <S%G5574>lie<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%>, we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G240>another<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of Jesus2424, 5547 <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2511>cleanseth<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>.
